SamPy.bolshoi.plotstellarmf.stellarmassfunc_plot¶

SamPy.bolshoi.plotstellarmf.stellarmassfunc_plot(path, database, redshifts, output_folder, outfile, mmax=12.5, mmin=8.0, nbins=30, nvolumes=15, lowlim=-4.9)¶

Plots stellar mass functions as a function of redshift. Compares to observations.
